00079 #define TRUE 1
00080 #define FALSE 0
00081 /* Convenience macros (we don't use them all) */
00082 #define  _BV(bit) (1 << (bit))
00083 #define  inb(sfr) _SFR_BYTE(sfr)
00084 #define  inw(sfr) _SFR_WORD(sfr)
00085 #define  outb(sfr, val) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) = (val))
00086 #define  outw(sfr, val) (_SFR_WORD(sfr) = (val))
00087 #define  cbi(sfr, bit) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) &= ~_BV(bit))
00088 #define  sbi(sfr, bit) (_SFR_BYTE(sfr) |= _BV(bit))
00089 #define  high(x) ((uint8_t) (x >> 8) & 0xFF)
00090 #define  low(x) ((uint8_t) (x & 0xFF))

00099 {
00100     volatile uint32_t timeValue;
00101     volatile uint8_t  timeByte[4];
00102 } time;

00144     volatile uint8_t outputPacketSendID;

00176 /****************************************************************************/
00179 int main(void)
00180 {
00182     wdt_disable();                  /* Stop watchdog timer */
00183     setErrorCode(0);                /* Turn off error messages */
00185     if (eeprom_read_byte((uint8_t *)0) == 0xFF)     /* If unprogrammed, use defaults */
00186     {
00187         rtcScale = RTC_SCALE;           /* Tick period for RTC */
00188         localEEPROMDevice = LOCAL_EEPROM_DEVICE;        /* Address of EEPROM on I2C bus */
00189         eepromEnd = EEPROM_END;     /* Last address of EEPROM */
00190     }
00191     else
00192     {
00193         rtcScale = eeprom_read_byte((uint8_t *)15);
00194         localEEPROMDevice = eeprom_read_byte((uint8_t *)14);
00195         eepromEnd = eeprom_read_word((uint16_t *)12);
00196     }
00197 
00199     configurePorts();
00200     openPanel();
00201     connectLoad();
00202     adcInit(ADC_MODE,ADC_SPEED);
00203     twiInit(TWI_SPEED);
00204     InitLCD(0x00);
00205     time.timeValue = 0;
00206     timer0Init(0,rtcScale);
00207 
00210     uart_init(BAUDRATE);
00211 
00213     sei();
00214 
00216     lastError = NO_ERROR;
00217     packetInState = IDLE;       /* state for packet input state machine */
00218     packetOutState = IDLE;      /* state for packet transmission state machine */
00219     outputCommand = NO_COMMAND; /* command for transmission */
00220     outputBusy = FALSE;
00221 
00224     initNartos();
00225     inputPacketReceiveID = taskStart((uint16_t)*inputPacketReceive,FALSE);
00226     initiateControlTaskID = taskStart((uint16_t)*initiateControlTask,FALSE);
00227     LCDClear();
00228     LCDWriteString("Solar Power");
00229     LCDGotoXY(0,1);                         /* Next Line */
00230     LCDWriteString("Regulator V0.0");
00231     nartos();
00232 }
00233 
00234 /****************************************************************************/
00240 /****************************************************************************/
00248 void initiateControlTask(void)
00249 {
00254     while (twiErrorStatus() == 0xFF) taskRelinquish();
00255     twiSetupTransaction(0);                 /* Write only */
00256     twiWriteByte(0);                        /* High EEPROM address */
00257     twiWriteByte(0);                        /* Low EEPROM address */
00258     bufferStartPointer = BUFFER_START;
00259     bufferEndPointer = bufferStartPointer;
00260     twiWriteByte(low(bufferStartPointer));  /* Start Pointer */
00261     twiWriteByte(high(bufferStartPointer));
00262     twiWriteByte(low(bufferEndPointer));    /* End Pointer */
00263     twiWriteByte(high(bufferEndPointer));
00264     if (twiLaunch(localEEPROMDevice))       /* device number */
00265     {
00266         while (twiErrorStatus() == 0xFF) taskRelinquish();
00267         uint8_t lastTwiError = twiErrorStatus();
00268         if (lastTwiError != 0) setErrorCode(WRITE_EEPROM_FAIL);
00269     }
00270     else
00271         setErrorCode(WRITE_EEPROM_FAIL);
00272 /* Set some defaults that can be changed in the configuration channel */
00273     adcShift = 5;
00274     storeInterval = 180;
00275     controlDisable = TRUE;
00277     controlDelayCounter = 0;
00278     controlTaskID = taskStart((uint16_t)*controlTask,FALSE);
00281     displayInterval = 30;
00282     displayTaskCounter = displayInterval;
00283     displayTaskID = taskStart((uint16_t)*displayTask,FALSE);
00284     taskExit();
00285 }

00287 /****************************************************************************/
00302 volatile uint16_t channelValue[4];
00303 volatile uint16_t scaledChannelValue[4];
00304 volatile uint8_t  numberChannels;
00305 volatile uint8_t  channelStart;
00306 volatile uint8_t  channel;
00307 volatile uint8_t  channelNumber;
00308 volatile uint32_t channelSum;
00309 volatile uint16_t adcErrorCount;
00310 volatile uint16_t sampleCount;
00311 volatile uint16_t testCount;
00312 volatile uint16_t runCount;
00313 
00314 void measurementTask(void)
00315 {
00319     numberChannels = eeprom_read_byte((uint8_t *)16);
00320     channelStart = 2+eeprom_read_byte((uint8_t *)1);    /* First Channel location (length)*/
00321     for (channel = 0; channel < numberChannels; channel++)
00322     {
00325         uint8_t channelId = eeprom_read_byte((uint8_t *)(channelStart+1));
00326         uint8_t channelType = (channelId >> 4);
00327         channelNumber = (channelId & 0x0F);
00329         if (channelType == 0x03)
00330         {
00331             storeInterval = eeprom_read_byte((uint8_t *)(channelStart+2));
00332             adcShift = eeprom_read_byte((uint8_t *)(channelStart+3));
00333             controlDisable = eeprom_read_byte((uint8_t *)(channelStart+4));
00334             floatThreshold = eeprom_read_word((uint16_t *)(channelStart+5));
00335             measureInterval = eeprom_read_byte((uint8_t *)(channelStart+7));
00336         }
00338         else if (channelType == 0x02)
00339         {
00343             channelSum = 0;                     /* cumulative sums */
00344             adcErrorCount = 0;                  /* Keep track of errored values */
00345             for (sampleCount = 0; sampleCount < (1 << adcShift); ++sampleCount)
00346             {
00353                 if(adcStart(_BV(channelNumber)))
00354                 {
00355                     int adcValue = 0;
00356                     do
00357                     {
00358                         taskRelinquish();
00359                         adcValue = adcRead(channelNumber);    /* Check if finished and grab result */
00360                     }
00361                     while (adcValue < 0);
00362                     uint16_t channelLastValue = adcValue;
00363                     channelSum += channelLastValue;
00364                     if (adcErrorCount > 0)
00365                     {
00366                         for (uint8_t i = 0; i < adcErrorCount; ++i)
00367                             channelSum += channelLastValue;
00368                         adcErrorCount = 0;
00369                     }
00370                 }
00371                 else adcErrorCount++;
00372             }
00374             channelValue[channelNumber] = (channelSum >> adcShift);
00376             uint16_t channelMulScale = eeprom_read_word((uint16_t *)(channelStart+6));
00377             uint16_t channelOffScale = eeprom_read_word((uint16_t *)(channelStart+8));
00378             scaledChannelValue[channelNumber] = rescale(channelValue[channelNumber],
00379                                                     channelMulScale,channelOffScale);
00380 /* Find the next channel information block. */
00381         }
00382         channelStart = channelStart+eeprom_read_byte((uint8_t *)(channelStart+0))+1;
00383     }
00384 
00385 /* Reschedule the control task and quit */
00386     taskSchedule(controlTaskID,FALSE);
00387     taskExit();
00388 }
00389 
00390 /****************************************************************************/
00402 volatile uint8_t  storeCount;
00403 
00404 void controlTask(void)
00405 {
00406     for(;;)
00407     {
00409         measurementTaskID = taskStart((uint16_t)*measurementTask,FALSE);
00410         taskWait();
00411 
00412 /* The core Control actions */
00413         if (! controlDisable)
00414         {
00415 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00418             uint16_t currentBatteryVoltage = scaledChannelValue[1];
00419             if (currentBatteryVoltage < floatThreshold)
00420                 openPanel();
00421             else
00422                 shortPanel();
00423         }
00424 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00426         if (storeCount < storeInterval) storeCount++;
00427         {
00428             storeCount = 0;
00429 
00431 /* Compute a new end pointer that would hold after a data block is written */
00432             if (eepromEnd - bufferEndPointer > DATA_BLOCK_SIZE)
00433                 newBufferEndPointer = bufferEndPointer + DATA_BLOCK_SIZE;
00434             else
00435                 newBufferEndPointer = BUFFER_START + DATA_BLOCK_SIZE;
00436 /* If full, move the buffer start pointer along one to allow the new value to
00437 overwrite the oldest value */
00438             if (newBufferEndPointer == bufferStartPointer)
00439             {
00440                 if (eepromEnd - bufferStartPointer > DATA_BLOCK_SIZE)
00441                     bufferStartPointer += DATA_BLOCK_SIZE;
00442                 else
00443                     bufferStartPointer = BUFFER_START;
00444             }
00445 /* Now write the new pointers so that data can be recovered from the EEPROM
00446 in the event of a power loss.*/
00447             while (twiErrorStatus() == 0xFF) taskRelinquish();
00448             controlDelayCounter = 2;
00449             taskWait();                         /* Wait for timer ISR */
00450             twiSetupTransaction(0);             /* Write only */
00451             twiWriteByte(0);                    /* Address */
00452             twiWriteByte(0x08);                 /* of pointers */
00453             twiWriteByte(low(bufferStartPointer));
00454             twiWriteByte(high(bufferStartPointer));
00455             twiWriteByte(low(newBufferEndPointer));
00456             twiWriteByte(high(newBufferEndPointer));
00457             twiLaunch(localEEPROMDevice);
00458 
00459 /* Write the conversion time and all relevant data to EEPROM */
00460             while (twiErrorStatus() == 0xFF) taskRelinquish();
00461             controlDelayCounter = 2;
00462             taskWait();                             /* Wait for timer ISR */
00463             twiSetupTransaction(0);                 /* Write only */
00464             twiWriteByte(high(bufferEndPointer));   /* Address */
00465             twiWriteByte(low(bufferEndPointer));
00466             for (uint8_t n = 0; n < 4; ++n)
00467                 twiWriteByte(time.timeByte[n]);
00468             for (uint8_t n = 0; n < 4; ++n)         /* Write scaled conversions */
00469             {
00470                 twiWriteByte(low(scaledChannelValue[n]));
00471                 twiWriteByte(high(scaledChannelValue[n]));
00472             }
00473             twiLaunch(localEEPROMDevice);
00474             bufferEndPointer = newBufferEndPointer;
00475         }
00476 
00477 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00478 /* Wait a bit to pad out cycle */
00479         controlDelayCounter = measureInterval;
00480         taskWait();
00481     }
00482 }
00483 
00484 /****************************************************************************/
00491 void displayTask(void)
00492 {
00493 /* Display on LCD Panel */
00494     LCDClear();
00495     LCDWriteString("Panel   = ");
00496     display(scaledChannelValue[0]);
00497     LCDWriteString("V");
00498     LCDGotoXY(0,1);                         /* Next Line */
00499     LCDWriteString("Battery = ");
00500     display(scaledChannelValue[1]);
00501     LCDWriteString("V");
00502     taskExit();
00503 }
00505 /****************************************************************************/
00514 /****************************************************************************/
00529 void processError(void)
00530 {
00531     while (outputBusy) taskRelinquish();
00532     outputCommand = ERROR_COMMAND;
00533     outputBuffer[0] = lastError;
00534     ++numberOutBytes;
00535     lastError = NO_ERROR;
00536     outputPacketSendID = taskStart((uint16_t)*outputPacketSend,FALSE);
00537     taskSchedule(inputPacketReceiveID,FALSE);
00538     taskExit();
00539 }
00540 
00541 /****************************************************************************/
00553 void processCommand(void)
00554 {
00555     while (outputBusy) taskRelinquish();
00556     numberOutBytes = 0;
00557     switch (inputCommand)
00558     {
00559 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00565         case UNIT_INF_ACCESS:
00566         {
00567             if (numberInBytes != 0) lastError = UNIT_INF_ACCESS_SYNTAX;
00568             else
00569             {
00570                 numberOutBytes = 7;
00571                 outputBuffer[0] = low(INF_BLOCK_START);
00572                 outputBuffer[1] = high(INF_BLOCK_START);
00573                 outputBuffer[2] = eeprom_read_byte(INF_BLOCK_START);
00574                 outputBuffer[3] = DATA_BUFFER_SIZE;
00575                 outputBuffer[4] = 0;    /* This would be the Board ID */
00576                 outputBuffer[5] = low(F_CPU/1000);
00577                 outputBuffer[6] = high(F_CPU/1000);
00578                 outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND;
00579             }
00580         }
00581         break;
00582 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00588         case READ_MEMORY:
00589         {
00590             if (numberInBytes != 3) lastError = READ_MEMORY_SYNTAX;
00591             else
00592             {
00593                 address = (uint8_t *) (inputBuffer[0] + (inputBuffer[1] << 8));
00594                 eepromCount = inputBuffer[2];
00595                 if (eepromCount > DATA_BUFFER_SIZE)
00596                     eepromCount = DATA_BUFFER_SIZE;
00597                 while (numberOutBytes < eepromCount)
00598                 {
00599                     if (eeprom_is_ready())
00600                     {
00601                         outputBuffer[numberOutBytes] = eeprom_read_byte(address);
00602                         ++numberOutBytes;
00603                         ++address;
00604                     }
00605                     else taskRelinquish();
00606                 }
00607                 outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND;
00608               }
00609         }
00610         break;
00611 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00617         case WRITE_MEMORY:
00618         {
00619             if ((numberInBytes < 3) || (numberInBytes > DATA_BUFFER_SIZE))
00620                 lastError = WRITE_MEMORY_SYNTAX;
00621             else
00622             {
00623                 address = (uint8_t *) (inputBuffer[0] + (inputBuffer[1] << 8));
00624                 eepromCount = 2;
00625                 while (eepromCount < numberInBytes)
00626                 {
00627                     if (eeprom_is_ready())
00628                     {
00629                         eeprom_write_byte(address,inputBuffer[eepromCount]);
00630                         ++eepromCount;
00631                         ++address;
00632                     }
00633                     else taskRelinquish();
00634                 }
00635                 outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND; /* command to send back */
00636             }
00637         }
00638         break;
00639 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00646         case READ_EEPROM:
00647         {
00648             if (numberInBytes != 4) lastError = READ_EEPROM_SYNTAX;
00649             else
00650             {                                   /* wait till not busy */
00651                 while (twiErrorStatus() == 0xFF) taskRelinquish();
00652                 eepromCount = inputBuffer[3];     /* number of bytes */
00653                 twiSetupTransaction(eepromCount); /* Write/Read */
00654                 twiWriteByte(inputBuffer[2]);     /* High address */
00655                 twiWriteByte(inputBuffer[1]);     /* Low address */
00656                 if (eepromCount > DATA_BUFFER_SIZE)
00657                     eepromCount = DATA_BUFFER_SIZE;
00658 /* Try to launch the read. If there is a problem, drop out */
00659                 if(twiLaunch(inputBuffer[0]))    /* device ID */
00660                 {
00661 /* The twiCompletionStatus shows if the transaction is busy and also how many
00662 bytes were read if an aborted transaction occurred. First wait until not busy.*/
00663                     while (twiCompletionStatus() == 0xFF) taskRelinquish();
00664                     uint8_t completionStatus = twiCompletionStatus();
00665                     {
00666                         uint8_t numberRead = eepromCount;
00667                         if (completionStatus != 0) numberRead = (completionStatus & 0x3F);
00668                         for (;numberRead > 0; --numberRead)
00669                         {
00670                             outputBuffer[numberOutBytes] = twiReadByte();
00671                             ++numberOutBytes;
00672                         }
00673                         if ((twiErrorStatus() == 0) && (completionStatus == 0))
00674                             outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND; /* command to send back */
00675                         else
00676                             lastError = READ_EEPROM_FAIL;
00677                     }
00678                 }
00679                 else
00680                     lastError = READ_EEPROM_FAIL;
00681                 if (lastError == READ_EEPROM_FAIL)
00682                 {
00683                     outputBuffer[1] = twiErrorStatus();
00684                     outputBuffer[2] = twiCompletionStatus();
00685                     numberOutBytes = 2;
00686                 }
00687             }
00688         }
00689         break;
00690 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00696         case WRITE_EEPROM:
00697         {
00698           if ((numberInBytes < 4) || (numberInBytes > DATA_BUFFER_SIZE))
00699             lastError = WRITE_EEPROM_SYNTAX;
00700           else
00701           {
00702             while (twiErrorStatus() == 0xFF) taskRelinquish();
00703             eepromCount = 3;                /* count of data bytes */
00704             twiSetupTransaction(0);         /* Write only */
00705             twiWriteByte(inputBuffer[2]);   /* High address */
00706             twiWriteByte(inputBuffer[1]);   /* Low address */
00707             while(eepromCount < numberInBytes)
00708             {
00709               if (! twiWriteByte(inputBuffer[eepromCount])) break;
00710               ++eepromCount;
00711             }
00712 /* Try to launch the write. If there is a problem, drop out */
00713             if (twiLaunch(inputBuffer[0]))  /* device number */
00714             {
00715               while (twiErrorStatus() == 0xFF) taskRelinquish();
00716               uint8_t lastTwiError = twiErrorStatus();
00717               if (lastTwiError == 0)
00718                 outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND; /* command to send back */
00719               else
00720                 lastError = WRITE_EEPROM_FAIL;
00721             }
00722             else
00723               lastError = WRITE_EEPROM_FAIL;
00724             if (lastError == WRITE_EEPROM_FAIL)
00725             {
00726               outputBuffer[1] = twiErrorStatus();
00727               outputBuffer[2] = twiCompletionStatus();
00728               numberOutBytes = 2;
00729             }
00730           }
00731         }
00732         break;
00733 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00739         case ADC_ONCE:
00740         {
00741             numberOutBytes = 1;
00742             if (numberInBytes != 2) lastError = ADC_SYNTAX;
00743             else
00744             {
00745                 adcChannel = inputBuffer[0];
00746                 uint8_t adcGain = inputBuffer[1];/* For this application, this is a dummy */
00747                 uint8_t adcStatus = adcStart(1 << adcChannel); /* Start Conversion */
00748                 if (! adcStatus)                /* Check if the start was successful*/
00749                 {
00750                     lastError = ADC_FAILURE;
00751                     outputBuffer[1] = adcStatus;
00752                 }
00753                 else
00754                 {
00755                     while (adcIsBusy()) taskRelinquish(); /* Wait for conversion to end */
00756                     outputBuffer[0] = timer0Read(); /* Timer current value */
00757                     for (uint8_t n=0;n<3;++n)
00758                     {
00759                         outputBuffer[numberOutBytes++] = time.timeByte[n];
00760                     }
00761                     int adcValue = adcRead(adcChannel);
00762                     outputBuffer[numberOutBytes++] = low(adcValue);
00763                     outputBuffer[numberOutBytes++] = high(adcValue);
00764                     outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND; /* command to send back */
00765                 }
00766             }
00767         }
00768         break;
00769 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00777         case STATE_VARIABLES:
00778         {
00779             if ((numberInBytes != 1) || (inputBuffer[0] != 0)) lastError = STATE_VARIABLE_SYNTAX;
00780             else
00781             {
00782                 for (uint8_t channel = 0; channel < 4; channel++)
00783                 {
00784                     outputBuffer[numberOutBytes++] = low(channelValue[channel]);
00785                     outputBuffer[numberOutBytes++] = high(channelValue[channel]);
00786                 }
00787                 outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND;
00788             }
00789         }
00790         break;
00791 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00801         case RESET_BUFFER_POINTERS:
00802         {
00803             if (numberInBytes != 0) lastError = RESET_BUFFER_POINTERS_SYNTAX;
00804             else
00805             {
00806                 numberOutBytes = 4;
00807                 outputBuffer[0] = low(bufferStartPointer);
00808                 outputBuffer[1] = high(bufferStartPointer);
00809                 outputBuffer[2] = low(bufferEndPointer);
00810                 outputBuffer[3] = high(bufferEndPointer);
00811                 bufferStartPointer = bufferEndPointer;
00812                 outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND; /* command to send back */
00813             }
00814         }
00815         break;
00816 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00820         case RESET_CLOCK:
00821         {
00822             if (numberInBytes != 0) lastError = RESET_CLOCK_SYNTAX;
00823             else
00824             {
00825                 time.timeValue = 0;
00826                 timer0Init(0,rtcScale);
00827                 outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND; /* command to send back */
00828             }
00829         }
00830         break;
00831 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00840         case BOOTLOADER_JUMP:
00841         {
00842           if (numberInBytes != 0) lastError = BOOT_SYNTAX;
00843           else
00844           {
00845             MCUSR = 0;
00846             WDTCSR = (1 << WDCE) | (1 << WDE);
00847             WDTCSR = (1 << WDE);
00848             outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND; /* command to send back */
00849           }
00850         }
00851         break;
00852 #ifdef CORE_DEBUG
00853 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00859         case READ_SRAM:
00860         {
00861           if (numberInBytes != 3) lastError = READ_SRAM_SYNTAX;
00862           else
00863           {
00864             address =(uint8_t *) (inputBuffer[0] + (inputBuffer[1] << 8));
00865             uint8_t count = inputBuffer[2];
00866             if (count > DATA_BUFFER_SIZE)
00867               count = DATA_BUFFER_SIZE;
00868             while (numberOutBytes < count)
00869             {
00870               outputBuffer[numberOutBytes] = *address;
00871               ++numberOutBytes;
00872               ++address;
00873             }
00874             outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND; /* command to send back */
00875           }
00876         }
00877         break;
00878 /* End of CORE_DEBUG section */
00879 #endif
00880 #ifdef DEBUG
00881 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00889         case SET_PORT_BIT:
00890         {
00891           if (numberInBytes != 1) lastError = READ_PORT_SYNTAX;
00892           else
00893           {
00894             uint8_t portBit = inputBuffer[0];
00895             uint8_t port = portBit & 0x0F;
00896             uint8_t bit = portBit >> 4;
00897             if (bit > 7) port = portBit;  /* fudge - drop through to default */
00898             switch (port)
00899             {
00900 #if defined PORTA
00901             case 0x0a: sbi(PORTA,bit); break;
00902 #endif
00903 #if defined PORTB
00904             case 0x0b: sbi(PORTB,bit); break;
00905 #endif
00906 #if defined PORTC
00907             case 0x0c: sbi(PORTC,bit); break;
00908 #endif
00909 #if defined PORTD
00910             case 0x0d: sbi(PORTD,bit); break;
00911 #endif
00912 #if defined PORTE
00913             case 0x0e: sbi(PORTE,bit); break;
00914 #endif
00915 #if defined PORTF
00916             case 0x0f: sbi(PORTF,bit); break;
00917 #endif
00918             default:
00919               lastError = NO_PORT;
00920               numberOutBytes = 1;
00921               outputBuffer[1] = portBit;
00922               break;
00923             }
00924             if (lastError == NO_ERROR)
00925               outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND; /* command to send back */
00926           }
00927         }
00928         break;
00929 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00937     case CLEAR_PORT_BIT:
00938     {
00939       if (numberInBytes != 1) lastError = READ_PORT_SYNTAX;
00940       else
00941       {
00942         uint8_t portBit = inputBuffer[0];
00943         uint8_t port = portBit & 0x0F;
00944         uint8_t bit = portBit >> 4;
00945         if (bit > 7) port = portBit;  /* fudge - drop through to default */
00946         switch (port)
00947         {
00948 #if defined PORTA
00949         case 0x0a: cbi(PORTA,bit); break;
00950 #endif
00951 #if defined PORTB
00952         case 0x0b: cbi(PORTB,bit); break;
00953 #endif
00954 #if defined PORTC
00955         case 0x0c: cbi(PORTC,bit); break;
00956 #endif
00957 #if defined PORTD
00958         case 0x0d: cbi(PORTD,bit); break;
00959 #endif
00960 #if defined PORTE
00961         case 0x0e: cbi(PORTE,bit); break;
00962 #endif
00963 #if defined PORTF
00964         case 0x0f: cbi(PORTF,bit); break;
00965 #endif
00966         default:
00967           lastError = NO_PORT;
00968           numberOutBytes = 1;
00969           outputBuffer[1] = portBit;
00970           break;
00971         }
00972         if (lastError == NO_ERROR)
00973           outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND; /* command to send back */
00974       }
00975     }
00976     break;
00977 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00982     case READ_PORT:
00983     {
00984       if (numberInBytes != 1) lastError = READ_PORT_SYNTAX;
00985       else
00986       {
00987         uint8_t port = inputBuffer[0];
00988         uint8_t portContents = 0;
00989         numberOutBytes = 1;
00990         switch (port)
00991         {
00992 #if defined PINA
00993         case 0x0a: portContents = inb(PINA); break;
00994 #endif
00995 #if defined PINB
00996         case 0x0b: portContents = inb(PINB); break;
00997 #endif
00998 #if defined PINC
00999         case 0x0c: portContents = inb(PINC); break;
01000 #endif
01001 #if defined PIND
01002         case 0x0d: portContents = inb(PIND); break;
01003 #endif
01004 #if defined PINE
01005         case 0x0e: portContents = inb(PINE); break;
01006 #endif
01007 #if defined PINF
01008         case 0x0f: portContents = inb(PINF); break;
01009 #endif
01010         default:
01011           lastError = NO_PORT;
01012           outputBuffer[1] = port;
01013           break;
01014         }
01015         if (lastError == NO_ERROR)
01016         {
01017           outputBuffer[0] = portContents;
01018           outputCommand = SUCCESS_COMMAND; /* command to send back */
01019         }
01020       }
01021     }
01022     break;
01023 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01024 /* End of DEBUG section */
01025 #endif
01026 
01029     default:
01030       lastError = UNKNOWN_COMMAND;
01031     break;
01032   }
01035   if (lastError == NO_ERROR)
01036     outputPacketSendID = taskStart((uint16_t)*outputPacketSend,FALSE);
01037   else
01038     outputPacketSendID = taskStart((uint16_t)*processError,FALSE);
01039   taskSchedule(inputPacketReceiveID,FALSE);
01040   taskExit();
01041 }
01042 
01043 /****************************************************************************/
01066 void inputPacketReceive(void)
01067 {
01068   for(;;)
01069   {
01070     uartInput = uart_getc();  /* upper byte has an error code, if any */
01071     if (high(uartInput) != 0) /* nonzero if error or no character received */
01072       taskRelinquish();
01073     else
01074     {
01075       uint8_t newCharacter = (uint8_t) uartInput & 0xFF;  /* lower byte */
01076       switch (packetInState)
01077       {
01083       case IDLE:                  /* loop until an idle char is received */
01084         if (newCharacter == IDLE_CHAR)
01085         {                         /* get here with a valid IDLE received */
01086           if (! outputBusy) uart_putc(IDLE_CHAR);  /* ping PC */
01087           packetInState = SYNC;   /* look for a sync character */
01088         }
01089         break;
01093       case SYNC:
01094         if (newCharacter == SYNC_CHAR) packetInState = ADDRESS;
01095         else if (newCharacter != IDLE_CHAR) packetInState =IDLE;
01096         else if (! outputBusy) uart_putc(IDLE_CHAR);  /* ping PC */
01097         break;
01101       case ADDRESS:
01102         packetInState = NUMBER_BYTES;
01103         break;
01106       case NUMBER_BYTES:
01107         numberInBytes = newCharacter;
01108         dataInByteCount = 0;      /* counter for data phase */
01109         if (numberInBytes == 0) packetInState = CHECKSUM;
01110         else packetInState = COMMAND;
01111         break;
01114       case COMMAND:
01115         inputCommand = newCharacter;
01116         if (--numberInBytes == 0) packetInState = CHECKSUM;
01117         else packetInState = DATA_PHASE;
01118         break;
01121       case DATA_PHASE:
01122         if (dataInByteCount < DATA_BUFFER_SIZE)
01123         {
01124           inputBuffer[dataInByteCount] = newCharacter;
01125         }
01126         if (++dataInByteCount == numberInBytes) packetInState = CHECKSUM;
01127         break;
01129       case CHECKSUM:
01130         packetInState = EOM;
01131         break;
01135       case EOM:
01136         packetInState = IDLE;
01137         if (newCharacter != EOM_CHAR)
01138         {
01139           lastError = COMMAND_SYNTAX;
01140           outputBuffer[1] = newCharacter;
01141           numberOutBytes = 1;
01142           processErrorID = taskStart((uint16_t)*processError,FALSE);
01143         }
01144         else
01145           processCommandID = taskStart((uint16_t)*processCommand,FALSE);
01146         taskWait();
01147         break;
01148       }
01149     }
01150   }
01151 }
01152 
01153 /****************************************************************************/
01165 void outputPacketSend(void)
01166 {
01167   outputBusy = TRUE;
01168   for(;;)         // Loop "indefinitely" but will exit when finished
01169   {
01170     if (! uart_output_free()) taskRelinquish();
01171     else
01172     {
01173       switch (packetOutState)
01174       {
01175       case IDLE:
01176         uart_putc(IDLE_CHAR);
01177         packetOutState = SYNC;
01178         break;
01179       case SYNC:
01180         uart_putc(SYNC_CHAR);
01181         packetOutState = ADDRESS;
01182         checkSum = 0;
01183         break;
01184       case ADDRESS:
01185         uart_putc(0x0);             /* Address is PC, packet type 0 */
01186         packetOutState = NUMBER_BYTES;
01187         break;
01188       case NUMBER_BYTES:
01189         uart_putc(numberOutBytes+1);
01190         checkSum += numberOutBytes+1;
01191         packetOutState = COMMAND;
01192         break;
01193       case COMMAND:
01194         uart_putc(outputCommand);
01195         checkSum += outputCommand;
01196         dataOutByteCount = 0;
01197         packetOutState = DATA_PHASE;
01198         break;
01199       case DATA_PHASE:
01200         if (numberOutBytes-- > 0)
01201         {
01202           uart_putc(outputBuffer[dataOutByteCount]);
01203           checkSum += outputBuffer[dataOutByteCount];
01204           ++dataOutByteCount;
01205         }
01206         else packetOutState = CHECKSUM;
01207         break;
01208       case CHECKSUM:
01209         uart_putc(checkSum);
01210         packetOutState = EOM;
01211         break;
01212       case EOM:
01213         uart_putc(EOM_CHAR);
01214         packetOutState = IDLE;
01215         outputCommand = NO_COMMAND;
01216         numberOutBytes = 0;
01217         outputBusy = FALSE;
01218         taskExit();
01219         break;
01220       }
01221     }
01222   }
01223 }
01225 /****************************************************************************/
01240 ISR(SIG_OVERFLOW0)
01241 {
01242     time.timeValue++;
01243 /* This counter is used to restart a task at precisely timed intervals.
01244 Set the counter just before starting the task for the first time, then
01245 issue a taskExit at the end of the task. The task should complete well
01246 before the time interval is finished */
01247     if ((displayTaskCounter > 0) && (--displayTaskCounter == 0))
01248     {
01249         displayTaskCounter = displayInterval;   /* Reset counter for next cycle*/
01250         displayTaskID = taskStart((uint16_t)*displayTask,TRUE);
01251     }
01252 /* This counter is used within a task to enter a timed wait state.
01253 Set the counter just before the taskWait command. */
01254     if ((controlDelayCounter > 0) && (--controlDelayCounter == 0))
01255     {
01256         taskSchedule(controlTaskID,TRUE);
01257     }
01258 }
01259 
01260 /****************************************************************************/
01269 long rescale(const int quantity,const int multiplier,const int offset)
01270 {
01271     uint16_t q = quantity;
01272     if (quantity < 0) q = -quantity;
01273     uint16_t m = multiplier;
01274     if (multiplier < 0) m = -multiplier;
01275     uint16_t o = offset;
01276     if (offset < 0) o = -offset;
01277     uint8_t lowVoltage = low(q);
01278     uint8_t highVoltage = high(q);
01279     uint8_t lowMultiplier = low(m);
01280     uint8_t highMultiplier = high(m);
01281     uint16_t first = lowVoltage*lowMultiplier;
01282     uint16_t second = lowVoltage*highMultiplier+ highVoltage*lowMultiplier;
01283     uint16_t third = highVoltage*highMultiplier;
01284     int product = ((high(first) + second) >> 2) + (third << 6);
01285     if (((quantity>0) && (multiplier<0)) || ((quantity<0) && (multiplier>0))) product = -product;
01286     if (offset>0) return product+o;
01287     else return product-o;
01288 }
01289 /****************************************************************************/
01295 /****************************************************************************/
01304 void display(const long value)
01305 {
01306     uint32_t v = value;
01307     if (value < 0)
01308     {
01309         v = -value;
01310         LCDByte(1,'-');
01311     }
01312     uint8_t precision = 4;
01313     for (uint8_t n = 0; n<precision; n++)
01314     {
01315         uint32_t x = v*10;
01316         uint8_t digit = (x >> 16);
01317         v = x - ((uint32_t)digit << 16);
01318         if ((n > 0) || (digit > 0)) LCDByte(1,digit+48);
01319         if (n == 1) LCDByte(1,'.');
01320     }
01321 }
01322 
01323 /****************************************************************************/
01331 void setErrorCode(const unsigned int code)
01332 {
01333     if (code == 0)
01334         offLED();
01335     else
01336     {
01337         onLED();
01338         LCDClear();
01339         LCDWriteString("Error Code: ");
01340         LCDWriteHexWord((unsigned int)code,0);
01341     }
01342 }
01344 /****************************************************************************/
01356 /****************************************************************************/
01368 void configurePorts(void)
01369 {
01370 /* Set PortD DDR bits 2-7 to outputs for LCD. Bits 0,1 are the USART ports */
01371     outb(DDRD,(inb(DDRD) | 0xFC));
01372 /* Set PORTB as outputs on bits 0-2 to set controls */
01373     outb(DDRB,(inb(DDRB) | 0x07));
01374 /* Set all four ADC port pins (analogue inputs) as inputs */
01375     outb(DDRC,(inb(DDRC) & 0xF0));
01376     outb(PRR,0x4D);                   /* power down unused peripherals */
01377     sbi(ACSR,7);                      /* Turn off Analogue Comparator */
01378 }
01379 /****************************************************************************/
01383 void openPanel(void)
01384 {
01385     sbi(PORTB,0);                     // Panel is not shorted
01386 }
01387 /****************************************************************************/
01391 void shortPanel(void)
01392 {
01393     cbi(PORTB,0);                     // Panel is shorted
01394 }
01395 /****************************************************************************/
01399 void connectLoad(void)
01400 {
01401     cbi(PORTB,1);                     // Load is connected
01402 }
01403 /****************************************************************************/
01407 void isolateLoad(void)
01408 {
01409     sbi(PORTB,1);                     // Load is not connected
01410 }
01411 /****************************************************************************/
01415 void onLED(void)
01416 {
01417     cbi(PORTB,2);                     // LED is off
01418 }
01419 /****************************************************************************/
01423 void offLED(void)
01424 {
01425     sbi(PORTB,2);                     // LED is on
01426 }
